review:
I came to Fortis Hospital for a laparoscopic surgery to remove a complex ovarian cyst. At first we consulted Dr. Jayashree Nagaraj, who recommended us to meet Dr. Nidhi as this will have a huge impact on my fertility related things and for her expertise in fertility related issues as well.

Dr. Nidhi was very sweet and welcoming, she explained to me throughly about the condition, entire medical procedure and post surgery recovery and all. She didn’t just limit it to the specific procedure, instead genuinely looked at and took in to consideration about every way that it will affect my health, fertility in the future also. 

Through the entire procedure, she constantly made sure that everything was going well, was available at anytime ready for any concerns even after I was  discharged from the hospital.

I highly recommend Dr. Nidhi for her expertise, kindness and also for being so supportive which is extremely important for a women going through such a phase

My wife was facing fertility issues and couldn't conceive. We visited Dr. Nidhi and she has guided well with all the treatments & medications for entire 4 months and today my wife has conceived with her treatment. Highly recommended for couples who are facing hard time.

Dr. Nidhi is highly recommended for fertility issues. She guided me throught my journey to conceive and finally I have conceived. She is very patient in answering the queries and explains the process in detail. Most of the patients have seen success results under her.

Initial we met Dr.nidhi madam and from the day one to till the end of delivery of my baby she taken care smoothly her we followed her  guidance  through out process and we blessed with baby boy from my bottom of the heart I thank to Dr.nidhi mam and staff really they taken care like a family member really I strongly recommend people seeing this review kindly for any thing please contact Dr.Nidhi jhawar madam 

Once again Thanku mam really we blessed to have a doctor like u

Recently I was blessed with a baby girl. If you are staying near BSK, *** **** ****** ** *** ***** ******* ** ***** ***** ******* *** ** ***** *** ** *** ** *** **** . She does not recommend unnecessary tests or medicines and also suggests natural remedies for small pregnancy related symptoms . she also does not encourage unnecessary hospital stay. Throughout the pregnancy she was extremely friendly and we are happy to have consulted her. Tq u Dr. Nidhi Jhawar mam.

I Visited Dr Nidhi Jhawar ma'am from the day one of my pregnancy which was smoothly taken by her and delivered my baby very well and normal.
I'm glad to met one of the best doctor .She is so sweet and caring. I had a great overall experience in this hospital I'm very thankful to Nidhi ma'am for such a supportive and caring journey.
I strongly recommend Dr Nidhi Jhawar ma'am for her wonderful work.
Your kindness will always be remembered in my heart.
You are the perfect example to be a doctor with positive , friendly encouraging attitude.

We meet with Dr Nidhi Jhawar 4  month back @ Nobel Multispecialty Hospital.We are glad that we meet Dr Nidhi Jhawar . She Truly deserves all appreciation and accolades . She is very experienced, calm, & friendly in nature. The best thing about her is how she focuses on patients. During the time she motivated my wife to stay active and eat healthy.she also goes in for minimal medication and testing &  believes that a natural process like pregnancy needs no intervention unless really required. she has been patient in answering questions. now suddenly i got transfer order from my job & we decided to shift new place . everything is all right but when I think about wife pregnancy treatment that time I really missed Dr Nidhi . we both Decided wherever we r moving we will go with Dr Nidhi advice. Would definitely recommend Her ! *** ** *** **** ************* * **** **** *
We meet Dr Nidhi jhawar for pregnancy checkup, we were happy with her treatment, recently I delivered with her, it went well, thanks Dr.
Dr Nidhi Jhawar is experienced doctor , we visited her for pregnancy care and delivery. Our delivery went well and smoothly. We are happy to find Dr Nidhi as our obstetrician. Thanku doctor.

I met Dr Nidhi Jhaver related to IVF 4 days ago.. she guided very well.. I have started my treatment. And after a few days my wife's treatment will start.. If you are looking for a best lady doctor then one of the best is Dr. Nidhi Jhawar
